thread.section_title: London House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value
thread.title_full: Good value - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Janetlynnbrooks
title: Good value
text:
We were offered a free upgrade when we checked in, and after being in Paris, I found the room to be a good size (enough room to walk around, leave your suitcase). The bed wasn't as comfortable as I would have hoped, but it suited our needs.
The hotel is in a safe area where we felt comfortable walking at night, and is close to the Bayswater rode station, which was really convenient. There are also lots of shops and restaurants nearby, so you don't need to venture far from the hotel after a long day of sightseeing to have dinner.
All in all we were pleased with our stay, but I may purchase an upgraded room if we visit again!
